Ezras pulpit. Or, A sermon lately preached in Southwarke, before a worshipfull assembly Very necessary for these times. By William Freake, minister. Freake, William.
[4], 22, [6] p.
Printed by Tho. Harper for Richard Harper, and are to be sold at his shop at the Bible and Harp in Smithfield, London : 1639.
The last two leaves are blank. Identified as STC 11346a on UMI microfilm reel 644. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
